How do I change my IP?: I was banned from an IRC server for unknown reason, and there email service is somhow not responding

This is offtopic for #ubuntu, but turning your modem off and back on, and/or resetting it might cause it to do that. In my experience with Comcast in California, that doesn't usually do anything, and you're at the liberty of their DHCP servers.
if you haven't already, #ubuntuone might be more helpful.
